channel.title: Item Drops an Trading Help!
channel.description: Hey, im newb. That's a start. I'll admit it. But anyway. I need help, I cant drop or trade on my server. Is there a code that disbales it? If so pls inform me, so i can delete it. My source is Richscape v2. Please help, its sabotaging my server. Also, i have a new hp and an old one, i would like to know how to delete that old one. Thank you.

item.title: Item Drops an Trading Help!
item.dc:creator: @superxero superxero
item.description:
@superxero wrote:

Dude, i luv you to pieces, in a non gay way of course. It Worked! TY!

Read full topic

item.title: Item Drops an Trading Help!
item.dc:creator: @mr_bob_silab2 mr bob silab2
item.description:
@mr_bob_silab2 wrote:

I used to play around with Rich Scape v2. I do not still have the files, but I remember that you can go into client.java and search for the message it sends you like “You can not drop items” or whatever and delete it and what is around it. I think it is if(playerRights = 1 { “MESSAGE” SOMETHING ELSE MAKING IT SO YOU CANT DROP } and delete all of that. Sorry that I can not give you the exact thing but I am not going to re downlaod Rich Scape. Hope I helped somewhat.

Read full topic
